name: Puzzle Master
description:
Puzzle Master is a classic puzzle game. There are two ways to play the game:

1. Swap tile puzzle mode, Solving puzzle by swapping two tiles to reach the correct position.(beginner, less difficult)
2. Slide the puzzle mode, Solving puzzle by moving the tile in each grid to the correct order. (Advanced, more difficult)

The game is perfect for playing while waiting in queue for another game or getting relax during work.

If you find the puzzle too difficult or want to view the original image directly, click the Play button to restore the puzzle directly.Game Features:
  • Over 50 puzzles
  • Relaxing music
  • Nice artwork
  • 2 gameplay
  • Multiple difficulty modes(3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7)
  • Reshuffle at any time and random order
  • Showing digit on each piece to indicate right order
  • Loading custom image to generate new puzzle
  • Share artwork to the workshop.
